title: Five of the biggest storylines to watch at the 2025 Masters
content: Can Scottie Scheffler win for the third time in four years? How will LIV golfers fare? We look at storylines to watch this week at the Masters.

title: Pedro Martinez: Family missing after roof collapse
content: Hall of Fame pitcher Pedro Martinez said on social media that several of his family members were inside the nightclub that collapsed in the Dominican Republic.

title: Bellinger swears off wings after food poisoning
content: Yankees outfielder Cody Bellinger has sworn off chicken wings for five years following his recent bout with food poisoning.

title: Texas Tech's Toppin, Big 12 POY, opts for return
content: Big 12 Player of the Year JT Toppin announced Wednesday he would be returning to Texas Tech to play his junior season.

title: Pirates say 'Bucco Bricks' to return amid backlash
content: The Pirates say their fan-purchased "Bucco Bricks" are in the process of being returned for a "more permanent display" at the stadium.

title: Arizona lands 5-star hoops prospect over USC
content: Five-star guard Brayden Burries, the second-highest-ranked prospect available in the senior class, committed to Arizona.

title: Soccer helps women be majority at LA Olympics
content: Female athletes will be in the majority at an Olympics for the first time at the 2028 Los Angeles Summer Games thanks to a big win for women's soccer, which will now feature 16 teams.

title: Djokovic crashes out in opener at Monte Carlo
content: Novak Djokovic's latest bid to win a 100th career title ended Wednesday in another surprising defeat to a familiar face.

title: Auburn's Freeze 'at peace' with cancer diagnosis
content: As he plans out his third season on the Auburn sidelines, Tigers coach Hugh Freeze, 55, told ESPN's Chris Low this week that he is "at peace" with his cancer diagnosis, and now, following a 5-7 season, "we've got to go compete and win some more games."

title: How Paige Bueckers’ game will translate to the WNBA
content: Only Caitlin Clark and Sue Bird have averaged 10 PPG and 5.0 APG as WNBA rookies, a group Bueckers should aspire to join.

title: Our hottest early MLB hot takes: From a Cy Young trifecta to an MVP candidate you've never heard of
content: What can we glean from two weeks of baseball? Enough to make our experts go all-in on their boldest predictions.

title: How has the torpedo bat changed the industry?
content: The torpedo bat's rise has changed the industry for the companies that make them. Here is one bat-maker's story.

title: From Lobo's 1995 champs to Bueckers' 2025 crown: Ranking all 12 UConn title teams
content: Paige Bueckers helped UConn win its 12th NCAA championship, and first since 2016. Where does this title rank?

title: The USWNT doesn't have a No. 1 goalkeeper, putting a longtime position of strength in doubt
content: After years of Alyssa Naeher and Hope Solo dominating, the USWNT is without a clear-cut starting goalkeeper, and no obvious No. 1 has emerged in auditions.

title: Cam Ward, Shedeur Sanders and the shared weakness that could make or break their NFL careers
content: Hanging on to the ball too long is a tough habit to break. Can the NFL draft's top QBs get their throws out quicker in the pros?

title: 'A big swing-and-miss': Has Deshaun Watson played his last down in the NFL?
content: Browns owner Jimmy Haslam admitted for the first time last week that the 2022 trade for Watson was a failure. What's next for Cleveland and its QB?

title: R.C. Slocum is the 'last one of those guys'
content: It will be a long time before another figure spends half a century working for a program the way that Slocum did at Texas A&M.

title: 'Violence. Lots of violence': What to expect in Patricio Pitbull's UFC debut
content: One of the best fighters to never have competed in the UFC -- until now -- looks to prove himself at UFC 314.

title: What's next for Denver after firing Michael Malone? NBA insiders debate the Nuggets' shocking move
content: The Nuggets stunned the league by moving on from their coach and GM. Why now? Where does Denver go from here? NBA insiders weigh in.

title: Scottie Scheffler's success on the course starts with his work off it
content: Scheffler's success on the course is built on otherworldly skill -- but it's also built on an emphasis on fitness that's helped unlock his best golf.

title: 'I just have a good feel about the place': A decade later, can Jordan Spieth do it again?
content: Ten years ago, Spieth had his lone coronation at the Masters. He still believes he can get another shot.

title: 2025-26 men’s college basketball rankings: Way-Too-Early Top 25
content: Florida captured the national title Monday night, but Houston is already the favorite at the top for next season.

title: Source: Salah edging closer to new Liverpool deal
content: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah is edging closer to signing a new deal at Anfield, a source confirmed.

title: Matić jabs at Onana: Among Utd's worst-ever GKs
content: Ex-Manchester United midfielder Nemanja Matić has hit back at goalkeeper André Onana, saying he is "one of the worst goalkeepers" in the club's history.

title: Klopp to return to Liverpool for 1st time since exit
content: Jürgen Klopp is set to return to Liverpool next month for the first time since he ended his infamous nine-year reign last summer.

title: Ter Stegen: 'Good and bad moments' with Messi
content: Barcelona goalkeeper Marc-André ter Stegen has said his relationship with former teammate Lionel Messi experienced ups and downs.

title: Sources: Columbus set to sign Union star Gazdag
content: The Columbus Crew are finalizing a deal to acquire star midfielder Dániel Gazdag from the Philadelphia Union, sources confirmed to ESPN's Jeff Carlisle.

title: Hayes 'prioritizing progress' despite USWNT loss
content: USWNT head coach Emma Hayes said she now has a clearer vision of which players are long-term solutions after their 2-1 loss to Brazil.

title: Dinamo sack Italy great Cannavaro after 3 months
content: Italian football great Fabio Cannavaro was fired as coach of Dinamo Zagreb on Wednesday with the team falling out of contention to win an eighth straight Croatian league title.

title: Ange hits back at 'glass half-empty' Spurs critics
content: Embattled Tottenham Hotspur manager Ange Postecoglou accused the club's critics of a negative agenda on Wednesday as he prepared for a pivotal game of his second season in charge.

title: Arsenal secure a Champions League win for the ages as Real Madrid hope for Bernabéu magic
content: This was Arsenal's finest hour in Champions League history, and it's hard to believe even Real Madrid can wage a comeback in the quarterfinal's return leg.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Zirkzee to aid Man United's Ndoye move?
content: Manchester United are ready to make a €30m move to sign Bologna winger Dan Ndoye. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Do not trade away these pitchers... or else!
content: Tristan H. Cockcroft takes a look at some solid starts from unexpected pitching sources. Should you buy in?

title: Trump Announces 90-Day Pause On Reciprocal Tariffs For Most Countries
content: Capping a day dominated by a back and forth between the US and China, Donald Trump on Wednesday made two major announcements on tariffs, appearing to give most countries a breather but doubling down on his tough stance on Beijing.

title: Trump's Gamechanger - 125% Tariff On China, Levies On 75 Others "On Hold"
content: Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs, which was meant to impose levies against all those who tariff US goods, has taken a fresh turn. It has evolved into a slugfest between China and the United States.

title: US Stocks Surge After Trump's 90-Day Pause On Tariffs For Most Nations
content: Wall Street stocks rocketed higher suddenly on Wednesday after US President Donald Trump announced a 90-day tariff pause on all countries except China.

title: Tahawwur Rana's Flight Has Left US, To Land In Delhi Tomorrow: Sources
content: Tahawwur Rana, India's most wanted who is accused of plotting the 26/11 terror attacks in Mumbai, is on way back to face the law.

title: India Ends Trans-Shipment Facility For Bangladesh To Export Goods
content: The government has terminated the trans-shipment facility that allowed export cargo from Bangladesh to third countries using Indian land customs stations en route to ports and airports, according to a government circular.

title: "India, China Relationship Is...": Beijing's Message After Trump's 104% Tariff
content: Donald Trump's tariffs are doing, it appears, what decades of political and diplomatic wrangling could not, at least with any great degree of success - to get India and China to work together.

title: Gujarat Woman Kills Infant Over 'Constant Crying', Throws Him Into Tank: Cops
content: A 22-year-old woman has been arrested here for allegedly murdering her infant son by throwing him into an underground water tank as she was disturbed over his "constant cry", police said on Wednesday.

title: 30-Year-Old Woman With 3 Children Converts, Marries Class 12 Student In UP
content: A 30-year-old woman with three children converted to Hinduism and married a 12th-grade student in a temple ceremony in Uttar Pradesh's Amroha district on Wednesday, police officials said.

title: IPL Live: Prasidh Krishna's Double-Wicket Over Puts GT On Brink Of Win vs RR
content: Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Live Updates, IPL 2025: GT are on the brink of victory vs RR in their IPL 2025 match

title: Drunk Flyer Pees On Co-Passenger On Air India's Delhi-Bangkok Flight
content: An Indian national allegedly urinated on a fellow passenger in a Delhi-Bangkok Air India flight today, sources said.

title: Explained: The US-China Tariff War Math As Trump And Xi Go 'All-In'
content: The two largest economies in the world - US and China - are at war, with tariffs being used as their weapon. As of now, US tariffs on China stand at 104 per cent and Chinese tariffs on US stand at 151 per cent. Here's a look at the calculation.

title: Video - "That's Not Breakfast": Delhi Police To Man 'Drinking' Inside Metro
content: A man was seen on camera chilling with a glass of 'liquor' and a boiled egg inside a moving Delhi Metro train.

title: 10 Days Before Daughter's Wedding, UP Woman Elopes With Would-Be Son-In-Law
content: Shivani was supposed to get married in 10 days. The invitations were printed and relatives had been invited. Then came a twist that left Shivani and her entire family stunned - her mother eloped with her would-be groom.

title: US Woman Travels To This Indian Village To Marry Her Instagram Friend
content: A US woman has travelled thousands of miles to marry the love of her life - a man who comes from a remote village in Andhra Pradesh.

title: India Gets Taste Of Satellite-Based Internet During Myanmar Quake Ops
content: India tried its first real-time use of satellite-based Internet during New Delhi's Operation Brahma - providing aid to the quake-hit residents of Myanmar.

title: Reciprocal tariffs reduced to 10% for India, other nations
content: Donald Trump said that he's backing down on most nations' tariffs for 90 days amid market meltdown, but he's raising China tariffs. Market participants have been urging Trump to reduce tariffs, as economists warn that these measures could trigger a worldwide economic downturn and push prices higher.

title: US stock markets zoom after Trump's pause on tariffs
content: US stock markets showed mixed but slightly positive performance on April 9, 2025, with the Nasdaq leading, up 1.25%. Meanwhile, global markets declined sharply as US-China trade tensions escalated. The US bond market faced turmoil, and the 30-year Treasury yield surpassed 5%. The dollar weakened, while gold rose, as investors sought safer assets.

title: IPL: Sudharsan stars in Gujarat's 58-run win over Royals
content: Sai Sudharsan's masterful 82 propelled Gujarat Titans to 217/6, overcoming an early Gill dismissal. Buttler's support and late cameos bolstered the total. Rajasthan's chase faltered despite Samson and Hetmyer's efforts, as Krishna's 3-24 and key wickets from Rashid and Kishore sealed a 58-run victory. Sudharsan's calm, impactful innings highlighted his rising prominence.

title: Walmart boycott: World's largest retailer tells protesters, 'we are America's ...'
content: Walmart is facing a week-long boycott, "Walmart Blackout," led by People’s Union USA over DEI rollbacks and tax concerns. While Walmart defends its community contributions and tax payments, critics argue the DEI changes undermine workplace diversity. Data suggests Walmart is more resilient to boycotts than Target, which faced significant backlash for similar initiatives.

title: 'Anti-Semitic activity on net will result in denial of visa or green card'
content: The US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) in a release stated, “Today, USCIS will begin considering aliens’ antisemitic activity on social media and the physical harassment of Jewish individuals as grounds for denying immigration benefit requests. This will immediately affect aliens applying for lawful permanent resident status, foreign students and aliens affiliated with educational institutions linked to antisemitic activity.”

title: Drama in Ahmedabad! Riyan Parag argues with umpire after dismissal
content: Riyan Parag's controversial dismissal sparked debate during Rajasthan Royals' IPL clash against Gujarat Titans. After edging to the keeper, Parag reviewed the decision but was given out via UltraEdge. Unconvinced, he exchanged words with the umpire before walking off, ending a promising stand and leaving Royals at 60 for 3.

title: Indian-American engineer Vaniya Agrawal shares resignation email she sent to Microsoft CEO
content: Vaniya Agrawal, an Indian-American software engineer, resigned from Microsoft after protesting the company's alleged role in providing AI technology to Israel's military. She disrupted Microsoft's 50th-anniversary celebration, accusing the company of enabling violence in Gaza. Agrawal cited a $133 million contract with Israel's Ministry of Defense and urged employees to sign the "No Azure for Apartheid" petition before being dismissed.

title: US mulls end to crucial training programme for int'l students
content: A bill targeting the Optional Practical Training (OPT) program, a pathway for international students to gain US work experience, has sparked concern, especially among the large Indian student population of 3.3 lakhs, with 97,556 currently in OPT. Introduced by Congressman Paul Gosar, the bill, H.R.2315, aims to prioritize American workers by eliminating OPT, which he argues incentivizes hiring foreign labor.

title: 'Be cool': Trump tries to calm nerves as US faces retaliation in trade war
content: President Trump called on Americans to “BE COOL” after China and the EU imposed retaliatory tariffs. His message came as US markets opened with mixed but slightly positive results. Despite global market instability and falling oil prices, Trump assured investors it’s a “great time to buy” and claimed world leaders are eager to negotiate.

title: AI tool aims to help conserve Japan's cherry trees
content: Japan's famed cherry trees are getting old, but a new AI tool that assesses photos of the delicate pink and white flowers could help preserve them for future generations. Hiroyuki Wada of the Japan Tree Doctors Association, who inspects cherry trees in major spots in Tokyo, helped supervise the AI tool.

title: How next round of job cuts at Microsoft’s may have an 'Amazon and Google angle'
content: Microsoft is reportedly considering another round of job cuts in May, driven by a push for greater efficiency and a leaner organizational structure. Sources indicate the cuts will likely target middle management roles and aim to increase the proportion of engineers to non-technical staff, mirroring similar restructuring efforts recently undertaken by tech giants Amazon and Google.

title: No-look shot goes wrong! Jaiswal takes a blinder to dismiss Rashid. Watch
content: Yashasvi Jaiswal stunned fans with a sensational diving catch to dismiss Rashid Khan during Rajasthan Royals’ IPL 2025 clash against Gujarat Titans. Rashid’s cameo ended at 12 runs as Jaiswal’s athletic effort stole the show. Gujarat, led by Sai Sudharsan’s 82, posted a strong total of 217/6 in Ahmedabad.

title: Happy Mahavir Jayanti 2025: 30+ messages, images, wishes, quotes, GIF and more
content: Mahavir Jayanti celebrates the birth of Lord Mahavir, the 24th Tirthankara of Jainism, on April 10, 2025. The festival honors his teachings of non-violence (Ahimsa), truth (Satya), compassion, and self-discipline. Devotees reflect on these principles and strive to embody them in their daily lives. The day is marked by prayers, spiritual gatherings, and spreading peace and harmony.

title: 'We should be a party of ... ': Tharoor's message to Cong on way forward
content: On the second day of All India Congress Committee (AICC) session taking place in Ahmedabad, Congress leader Shashi Tharoor on Wednesday said that the party should represent hope and positivity instead of resentment and criticism. The veteran leader also slammed Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) for trying to divide the country into North and South.

title: Watch: Yuzvendra Chahal's 'wholesome' meeting with MS Dhoni
content: A viral video of Yuzvendra Chahal warmly reuniting with MS Dhoni after the CSK vs PBKS match has won hearts online. The moment follows another buzzworthy post featuring Chahal and rumoured girlfriend RJ Mahvash, who showed public support for the spinner, hinting at a blossoming friendship amid IPL 2025.

title: 'Pee-gate' 2.0: Flyer urinates on co-passenger aboard Air India flight
content: A business class passenger on Air India’s Delhi-Bangkok flight urinated on a co-passenger before landing on April 9, 2025. Air India confirmed the incident and said the crew followed procedures. The victim declined to file a complaint, and an internal panel will decide on further action. This follows a similar incident in 2022.

title: Jofra Archer castles Shubman Gill with a fiery 147.7 kmph delivery - Watch
content: Jofra Archer clean bowled Gujarat Titans skipper Shubman Gill with a fiery 147.7 kmph delivery in their IPL 2025 clash, marking his third dismissal of Gill in just 15 balls faced. The video of the wicket went viral as Archer continued his strong comeback after a record-expensive spell earlier this season.

title: 40-yr-old woman elopes with would-be son-in-law days before wedding
content: In a shocking turn of events, a 40-year-old woman from Aligarh eloped with her daughter's 20-year-old fiancé just days before their wedding. The couple allegedly absconded with Rs 2.5 lakh in cash and jewellery, prompting a police investigation. Authorities are currently searching for the duo, with suspicions pointing towards Uttarakhand as a possible hideout.

title: Viral Clip: Preity Zinta spotted with new IPL hero Priyansh Arya
content: Preity Zinta shared a heartfelt moment with Priyansh Arya after his explosive 103 off 42 balls helped Punjab Kings defeat CSK. The 24-year-old’s knock, featuring seven 4s and nine 6s, made him the second-fastest Indian centurion in IPL history. Zinta’s joyful celebration and Arya’s rise have since gone viral, marking a star’s arrival.

title: 'Sometimes our best is not good enough': SRK's heartfelt message to KKR
content: After a narrow four-run loss to Lucknow Super Giants, KKR shared a heartfelt message from team owner Shah Rukh Khan. In his note, SRK praised the team’s fight, urged them to move on with heads held high, and reminded them that heartbreak can bring a team closer. The message has gone viral.

title: The making of six-hitting Priyansh Arya: A Gambhir touch!
content: Priyansh Arya, who was the top-scorer for Delhi in last year’s Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy with 222 runs at the strike rate of 166.91, grabbed eyeballs in the inaugural Delhi Premier League. Playing for South Delhi Superstarz, Arya slammed 608 runs in 10 innings with a whopping strike rate of 198.69, with two centuries and four fifty-plus total.

title: 'Rana should be hanged': Father of cop killed in 26/11 terror attacks
content: Tahawwur Rana is being extradited after the US Supreme Court rejected his plea seeking extradition to India.

title: Watch: Virat Kohli's heartwarming gesture for a little fan at Wankhede
content: A heartwarming video of Virat Kohli signing an autograph for a young fan went viral after RCB’s 12-run win over Mumbai Indians at Wankhede. The touching gesture came as Bengaluru broke a 10-year losing streak at the venue, with Kohli leading the charge with a 67-run knock.

title: Jaya Bachchan calls Abhishek-Shweta achievement, Hania Aamir supports Apoorva Mukhija and more
content: Today's top entertainment highlights include Jaya Bachchan proudly calling her children her biggest achievement, RJ Mahvash sparking dating rumours with Yuzvendra Chahal, and Bollywood mourning producer Salim Akhtar. Also making headlines: Suchitra Krishnamoorthi opens up about Shah Rukh Khan, and Hania Aamir supports Apoorva Mukhija amid online threats after a recent controversy.

title: The heart of a champion: Alex Ovechkin’s parents, Mikhail & Tatyana Ovechkina
content: Alexander Ovechkin, the Washington Capitals' captain, has surpassed Wayne Gretzky's long-standing record of 894 NHL goals, now standing at 895. Ovechkin's parents, Tatyana and Mikhail, have been his unwavering support system. Tatyana, a former Soviet basketball star with two Olympic gold medals and a World Championship, has been a constant presence at his games.

title: ‘Death by China': How Peter Navarro shaped Trump's trade war and Beijing tariff
content: More than a decade after Death by China, Peter Navarro’s once-marginal warnings are shaping US policy. The 104% tariff on Chinese EVs echoes his thesis: China’s rise is a strategic threat. Critics warn of global disruption, but Navarro’s ideas now resonate worldwide, fueling economic nationalism and redefining trade debates in an era of geopolitical and technological rivalry.

title: 'Using it out of frustration': Kaif questions 'retired out' tactic in IPL
content: Mohammad Kaif criticised the rising use of the 'retired out' tactic in IPL 2025, calling it an act of frustration. His remarks followed CSK’s decision to retire out Devon Conway on 69 during a steep chase against Punjab Kings — a move that failed as CSK lost by 18 runs.

title: How room full of GMs put an end to FIDE vs Freestyle Chess row
content: Viswanathan Anand's withdrawal from the Freestyle Chess Grand Slam in Germany dealt a major blow to hopes of reconciliation between FIDE and Freestyle Chess. Tensions escalated after a dress code dispute involving Magnus Carlsen, with Anand enforcing FIDE rules. Despite backchannel talks, Freestyle players ultimately chose to crown their own “Freestyle Chess Champion,” sidelining FIDE’s authority.

title: 'Unilateralist and protectionist acts': China releases White Paper on tariff
content: The US-China tariff war escalated sharply, with the US imposing 104% tariffs and China retaliating with 34%. Amid rising tensions, China released a White Paper condemning US protectionism and unilateralism, warning of economic instability and disrupted global trade. It calls for equal dialogue and multilateral cooperation to resolve differences and maintain global economic order and stability.

title: SC pulls up Centre for missing deadline on cashless medical treatment scheme
content: The Supreme Court sharply criticised the Centre on Wednesday for delaying the implementation of a cashless treatment scheme for motor accident victims. Citing a breach of its January 8 order, the court summoned the transport ministry secretary to explain the delay. The court emphasised that financial hold-ups cost lives, and warned of contempt proceedings. The scheme, mandated under the Motor Vehicles Act, was to ensure critical care during the ‘golden hour’ post-accidents.

title: Is it official? Chahal shares photo with Mahvash amid relationship talks
content: Yuzvendra Chahal has sparked relationship rumours after sharing a photo with RJ Mahvash on Instagram, following his split from Dhanashree Verma. Mahvash, seen supporting Punjab Kings at an IPL match, posted a heartfelt message for Chahal. Chahal responded warmly, praising her support. Their social media exchange has caught fans’ attention and stirred speculation.

title: Gretzky’s wife gifts $280k ring to Ovechkin’s wife after record goal
content: Alex Ovechkin's historic 895th goal, surpassing Wayne Gretzky's record, was celebrated with a unique tradition. Janet Gretzky gifted Anastasia Shubskaya, Ovechkin's wife, an eight-carat diamond ring, continuing a custom started by Colleen Howe. Despite the Capitals' loss to the Islanders, the focus remained on Ovechkin's legacy and the enduring bond between hockey families as the Capitals head into the playoffs.

title: Explained: What's the difference between 'Retired Hurt' and 'Retired Out'?
content: In a rare tactical move during Indian Premier League 2025, CSK retired out Devon Conway on 69 in the 18th over vs Punjab Kings. Replaced by Jadeja, the decision aimed to boost the chase but failed. It marked the season’s second such instance, sparking debate on “retired out” vs “retired hurt.”

title: ‘Speak Marathi, not English’: Woman with baby thrashed for saying 'excuse me'
content: In Dombivli, a dispute erupted when Poonam Gupta greeted her neighbors in English, leading to a violent altercation. The Dhoble family allegedly assaulted Gupta, her friend, and her husband after taking offense to the language. Initially, police filed a non-cognizable complaint, but after CCTV footage surfaced showing the Dhobles' aggression, they are reconsidering.

title: King James meets Ken: LeBron enters 'Barbie World' in historic fashion
content: leBron James will soon be seen on toy shelves around the country . the four-time NBA champion is the first athlete to have his own replica of a Ken doll . "it's an opportunity to recognize the powerful impact of role models," he says .

title: 'This trade really hurt': Luka's return reminds Dallas of what it lost
content: LUKA DONCIC PULLED his '68 Camaro into the American Airlines Center parking garage . he sported a black, western cut button-down shirt with a bolo tie, some Wrangler jeans and even a pair of Lucchese boots . it was a big day for the Dallas Mavericks, who were hosting leBron James and the los Angeles Lakers .

title: Stanley Cup playoff watch: Matchups to monitor Wednesday
content: playoff and draft lottery ramifications aplenty, so let's hit all five matchups rapid-fire . a win over the Flyers would be a good step toward climbing back into the playoffs . the flyers are fourth in the draft lottery order heading into this matchup .

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where all 30 teams stack up at the end of the regular season
content: the 2024-25 season wraps up Sunday but all eyes will be on Wednesday's clash with the Dallas Mavericks . the Sacramento Kings host the Denver Nuggets (ESPN, 10:30 p.m. ET), who will take the court for the first time since Tuesday's firing of an NBA coach . top playoff contenders are aiming to lock up their postseason spots .

title: How each team could win the national championship
content: the 2025 men's Frozen Four is the culmination of the NCAA hockey tournament . it features two teams with a lot of experience on this stage and two newcomers . the semifinal matchups will be Thursday at 5 and 8:30 p.m. ET at the Enterprise Center in St. Louis .

title: How does the F1 championship look heading into the Bahrain GP?
content: Max Verstappen has caught up to Lando Norris in the drivers' championship . the forecast is hot and sunny with daytime highs of 36°C from Friday through to Sunday . nighttime temperatures are expected to drop to around 22°C .

title: Inter's Martínez and Thuram could be Inzaghi's X factors in the Champions League
content: Inter beat Bayern Munich 2-1 in their UEFA Champions League quarterfinal first leg . a striker partnership was more than evident at the Allianz Arena on Tuesday night . the two strikers combined brilliantly on the first goal, with Thuram's sugar sweet layoff .

title: Syro-Malabar Church slams allegations over landed property
content: The attempt is to make the Catholic Church go on the defensive and to unleash strong criticism of the Church and its activities, says official spokesman of the Syro-Malabar Church

title: LDF, UDF lock horns over ASHA workers at Kochi Corporation Council meeting
content: UDF councillor V.K. Minimol moves resolution demanding increase in remuneration of ASHAs in the Kochi Corporation; LDF members dub it as a politically motivated act

title: Supreme Court to hear Waqf law challenge on April 16
content: Centre has already filed a caveat in Supreme Court to ensure no order is passed without hearing it first; case listed before a Bench headed by Chief Justice of India Sanjiv Khanna

title: Mamata assures minorities that she will protect their interests
content: West Bengal Chief Minister’s remarks come a day after protests over the Waqf (Amendment) Act turned violent at Jangipur in Murshidabad district where a mob set police vehicles on fire.

title: Values enshrined by Jainism offer answer to global challenges: PM Modi
content: The Prime Minister claimed during his virtual address on Navkar Mahamantra Divas, that Jain principles of self-purification, non-violence, and collective well-being align with his vision of ‘Viksit Bharat’.

title: Tahawwur Rana a small player, U.S. had stalled Headley’s extradition, says ex-Home Secretary G.K. Pillai
content: Despite knowing about the terror plan, the U.S. let Rana’s school friend and main conspirator, David Coleman Headley, to continue with his ‘anti-India activity’; and after the latter’s arrest in 2009, the Americans stalled his extradition to India by offering him plea-bargaining, he says

title: New Cyber Command headed by Director General of Police to tackle cybercrimes and cybersecurity
content: The move comes amidst rising cybercrime cases in the State. Bengaluru accounts for 20% of all cybercrimes registered in megacities in the country

title: West Bengal will file review petition in Supreme Court on annulment of employment, says Chief Secretary
content: West Bengal Chief Secretary Manoj Pant said that the State government has already filed a clarificatory petition urging the Supreme Court to allow teachers to work

title: It’s curtains down on BJP’s Christian ‘romance drama’: Pinarayi
content: He says RSS will inevitably target Catholic Church’s properties; the BJP may test the waters by introducing a private members’ Bill in Lok Sabha

title: BJP attacks Rahul Gandhi’s ‘belated’ response to Waqf Act
content: ‘Do you have a problem if Waqf is being reformed for the betterment of the women, widows, of the Muslim community?’ BJP MP Ravi Shankar Prasad said at a press conference

title: Karnataka explores legal framework to regulate online gaming
content: Karnataka is considering adopting a model similar to that of Chhattisgarh, which allows skill-based gaming while prohibiting betting and games of luck

title: Two encounters rage in J&K’s Udhampur, Kishtwar: Officials
content: According to the officials in Jammu and Kashmir, five to six militants are suspected to be in hiding, with no casualties on either side reported so far.

title: Victim’s mother moves Supreme Court against Allahabad High Court order on rape attempt
content: The top court had remarked the order of the High Court was ‘totally insensitive, inhuman” and “unknown to the tenets of law’

title: Tirupati-Katpadi railway line to be doubled at ₹1,332 crore
content: Cabinet approves project; It will improve connectivity to Tirumala temple and other places of worship and tourist destinations, says Railways

title: NC, PDP to move Supreme Court over Waqf Act; Mirwaiz to support AIMPLB’s legal action
content: A scheduled meeting of the Mutahida Majlis Ulema (MMU), an amalgam of over 20 religious organisations in J&K, was disallowed by the authorities

title: ASHAs stir: panel to submit report in three months
content: Incentive announced by the Union government at the time of the launch of ASHA scheme remained the same even now, says Chief Minister

title: Andhra Pradesh govt. planning to establish Mega Global Medicity in Amaravati
content: It is one among the 25 projects proposed under PPP model by the Centre across the country; Andhra Pradesh has already expressed its willingness to allot 200 acres for it in CRDA limits

title: Kerala Tourism ties up with Malaysia Airlines to boost inbound travel
content: The move is part of exploration of the vast East Asian markets as part of Kerala Tourism’s ‘Look East’ campaign

title: Cross-border liquor smuggling completely stopped: Kollu Ravindra
content: The availability of more than 300 multinational brands of liquor at affordable prices has obviously avoided the need for smuggling, says Minister for Excise and Prohibition

title: India’s MMR comparison to Nigeria unfair, says Health Ministry
content: Report by United Nations Maternal Mortality Estimation Inter-Agency Group (MMEIG) states that India has made significant strides in reducing MMR but it registered 19,000 maternal deaths in 2023 — contributing almost 7.2% to global mortality

title: Operation Nanhe Farishte: Over 580 children rescued by RPF in South Western Railway zone
content: According to the data accessed by The Hindu, of the total rescued, 480 were boys and 103 were girls, who were either reunited with their families or placed in institutional care.

title: Water Board to launch ‘motor-free tapwater’ campaign
content: To conserve water and ensure fair supply and use by all consumers, the Board said violations can be reported at customer care number 155313

title: ‘NTR Sujala Sravanthi’ will be relaunched in Nellore district at a cost of ₹4.8 crore, says Municipal Administration Minister Narayana
content: Under the scheme, the government proposes to provide 20 litres of safe drinking water to each household for ₹2

title: Centre gives nod to six more Eklavya Model Residential Schools in Tripura
content: The schools will be managed by the Tripura Tribal Welfare Residential Educational Institutions Society

title: Chittoor MP thanks Centre for allocating ₹1,332 crore for Tirupati-Katpadi railway line
content: The ambitious project involves the construction of a 104-km double line, which will galvanise Chittoor’s rail connectivity and transport network in the region, says Chittoor MP

title: ED convinced that CPI(M) has no account in Karuvannur bank, says MP
content: ED had claimed that the Thrissur district committee of the party had opened an account in the bank in 2017 while K. Radhakrishnan was the CPI(M) district secretary

title: CM Pinarayi Vijayan says SFIO case against daughter Veena smacks of political vendetta
content: He said the agencies (SFIO and the Income Tax Department’s Interim Settlement Board) that brought the charges against Ms Veena had questionably spotlighted her relationship with the Chief Minister as an inculpating factor.

title: Kerala researchers win international grant for hornbill conservation
content: The grant will be used for a conservation initiative in the plantations of Wayanad with local participation. The Malabar Grey Hornbill nests outside protected areas too, including in plantations and agricultural areas

title: Skill development will help prison inmates establish a livelihood, says Chittoor Collector
content: Sumit Kumar distributes certificates to inmates of Chittoor district sub-jail who completed training programme in multi-skill trade under the ‘Sankalp-Skill Training’ initiative

title: BSF personnel, including woman constable, foil cattle-smuggling attempt on Indo-Bangladesh border in Bengal, rescue 8 cattle
content: In two other incidents in the Malda region, jawans of the 88th Battalion and 71st Battalion had foiled smuggling attempts and rescued 11 animals, says the BSF

title: Thirteen killed after lightning strikes in Bihar
content: In an official press statement from the CM house, Mr. Kumar has directed to immediately give an ex-gratia grant of ₹4 lakh to the families of all the deceased.

title: Hurt Over Rs 2-3 Crore Loss, Mary Kom Leaves Husband Onler: Report
content: the trouble in the couple's paradise is said to have started after Mary's husband, Karung Onkholer . the couple had spent Rs 2-3 crores while campaigning, but the defeat in the elections left the two shattered . onler, on the other hand, is in Delhi .

title: Vruthi national conclave inaugurated; to showcase Kerala’s achievements in waste management
content: Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan calls for a collective effort in evolving sustainable waste management practices

title: Pro-synod groups join hands against rebels in Ernakulam-Angamaly Archdiocese
content: The groups have called for the resignation of Major Archbishop Raphael Thattil and his vicar Joseph Pamplany

title: Hubballi mofussil bus stand to be closed for four months for flyover construction
content: The Deputy Commissioner seeks the cooperation of all for the completion of the remaining work under the project

title: VGF for Vizhinjam port: State inks agreement with Centre
content: State signs two agreements with Centre- a tripartite agreement between the Centre, AVPPL, and the bank consortium and premium sharing agreement which ensures that the Centre receives a 20% share of revenue from the port from 2034

title: Vaishnaw asks UIDAI to revise Aadhaar law to gel with personal data protection Act
content: DPDP Act lays out requirements for firms and government bodies to protect personal data, and provides for penalties in case of data breaches or leaks

title: TDP demands legal action against ‘Sakshi’ for ‘spreading defaming and incendiary’ rumours
content: In a memorandum to Director General of Police Harish Kumar Gupta, the party  alleges that the newspaper has been publishing false reports in order to create an atmosphere of unrest and violence between the TDP and YSRCP cadres, and garner political mileage for the YSRCP

title: Police to get drone cameras, fingerprint equipment to speed up investigations, crack cases faster: A.P Home Minister
content: The effective functioning of the police department has ensured an impressive recovery rate in theft cases in all districts including Srikakulam and Vizianagaram. Accused in theft cases are being arrested within 48 hours, said Home Minister Vangalapudi Anitha

title: After dismal show by students, govt. to analyse Class VIII Hindi results and adopt corrective measures
content: The General Education department will study if there is enough time to communicate the textbook content to students, how Hindi is taught, and if activities involving use of Hindi are taken up in the class and whether adequate time is available for these.

title: Civil Supplies Minister Nadendla Manohar orders seizure of fair price shop at AP Bhavan in Delhi
content: In a surprise check, he finds irregularities in weighing rice bags and sizeable quantity of broken grains in the rice

title: Over 300 dengue cases reported in Ernakulam since March 1
content: A spike in dengue cases has been reported in areas under the Kochi Corporation and the Thrikkakara and Kalamassery municipalities

title: J&K Assembly session ends amid noisy scenes over Waqf law
content: health Matters Ramya Kannan writes to you on getting to good health, and staying there The View From India Looking at World Affairs from the Indian perspective . the weekly newsletter from science writers takes the jargon out of science and puts the fun in!
